channel.title: Making items train different skills
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make a wepon train another stat, like making a magic bow train magic, or a glow dagger train firemaking?
If anyone has the file name, or anything, I will be most grateful, and if it is item.cfg, then please tell me which number to edit
-Nima304

item.title: Making items train different skills
item.dc:creator: @X_Evanz_X X Evanz X
item.description:
@X_Evanz_X wrote:

if (WeaponName.equals("Unarmed") && atObject == ####) { addSkillXP((xpHere * playerLevel[6]), 6); // mage }

Might work, random guess + just typed it up

Read full topic
